metadata.name: The Hermit
metadata.description:
The Hermit seeks knowledge from within.
A lonely wanderer in the path of the night, he seeks the inner voice, which can only be obtained through prolonged solitude.
To hear it, he must disconnect from the crowds, whose voices and desires threaten to drown out his own.
He walks through the dark night of his unconscious, guided only by the dim light of the northern star.

-
Exploring magical worlds with Tarot. 
"The Hermit" 
Ghost -  2022
Genesis piece

4096x4096px
600dpi
